input


handle keyboard / mouse input
read state or callback to get events


KeyboardLayout

type: C enum
KEYBOARD_LAYOUT_UK
KEYBOARD_LAYOUT_US
KEYBOARD_LAYOUT_FR
KEYBOARD_LAYOUT_COUNT

type: C enum
KEY_IDLE
KEY_UP
KEY_DOWN

KeyboardLock

type: C enum
KEYBOARD_LOCK_CAPS
KEYBOARD_LOCK_NUM
KEYBOARD_LOCK_SCROLL
KEYBOARD_LOCK_COUNT

InputKey

typedef struct {
  KeyState state;
  uint     down_count;
  uint     up_count;
} InputKey;
type: C struct

Mouse

typedef struct {
  InputKey button_left;
  InputKey button_right;
  InputKey button_middle;
  int      wheel;
} Mouse;
type: C struct

Keyboard

typedef struct {
  InputKey keys[VIRTUAL_KEY_COUNT];
} Keyboard;
type: C struct

InputDeviceType

type: C enum
INPUT_DEVICE_MOUSE
INPUT_DEVICE_KEYBOARD
INPUT_DEVICE_GAMEPAD
INPUT_DEVICE_TYPE_COUNT

InputEventType

type: C enum
INPUT_EVENT_MOUSE_MOVE
INPUT_EVENT_MOUSE_BUTTON_UP
INPUT_EVENT_MOUSE_BUTTON_DOWN
INPUT_EVENT_MOUSE_WHEEL
INPUT_EVENT_KEYBOARD_KEY_UP
INPUT_EVENT_KEYBOARD_KEY_DOWN
IINPUT_EVENT_COUNT

InputEvent

typedef struct {
  InputDeviceType device_type;
  uint            device;
  InputEventType  type;
  uint8           data[8];
} InputEvent;
type: C struct

window_input_callback

typedef void(*window_input_callback)(ameWindow*, const InputEvent*);
type: C typedef
